casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert G. MITCHELL. No. 156P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

*374The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of March 2007 by Defendant for Relief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
